subject: how to know if a test has failed
msgSnippet: Hello, I want to execute some actions on @After only if the @Test has failed. Is there a function to know it a test has failed? thanks, pura vida. -- Leo
messageBody:
Hello,

I want to execute some actions on @After only if the @Test has failed.
Is there a function to know it a test has failed?

thanks,
pura vida.

--
